text:
Hi Team, or one of our partners clients (enterprise account) we are building a custom module with HubSpot serverles functions. We are currently working in a CMS DEV sandbox account but are running accounts some permission errors.

We found this thread on the dev community: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Issue-with-deploying-serverless-functions/td-p/733005>

Who could help us with this?
When you say enterprise, is this related to CMS enterprise? Or which package does the portal have?
